books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A young woman, while putting down roots in a small North Carolina town, is haunted by a dark secret from her past.
books.name: SAFE HAVEN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Jessica Sorensen
books.description: A boy and girl, both of whom have tragedy in their past, come together after a chance encounter in college.
books.name: THE COINCIDENCE OF CALLIE AND KAYDEN

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: The man who has been relentlessly pursuing Sky Davis is not who he pretends to be.
books.name: HOPELESS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange this information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross confronts both a hostage situation and a terrorist act at Christmas.
books.name: MERRY CHRISTMAS, ALEX CROSS

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The military investigator John Puller probes his aunt’s mysterious death in Florida.
books.name: THE FORGOTTEN

books.author: by Yann Martel
books.description: A teenage boy and a 450-pound tiger are thrown together in a lifeboat after a shipwreck; now a movie.
books.name: LIFE OF PI

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The New Jersey bounty hunter Stephanie Plum tracks a con man who disappeared from a hospital.
books.name: NOTORIOUS NINETEEN

books.author: by Stephenie Meyer
books.description: Aliens control the minds and bodies of most humans, but one woman won't surrender.
books.name: THE HOST

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the 40-year-old disappearance of a Swedish heiress.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment is to stop Lee Harvey Oswald.
